page.title: 17Bettws Shopping Centre
page.content: Bettws Shopping Centre is,like the Bettws estate itself,a fairly recent development.It is a{purpose built {centre}of eighteen seperate units,two of which are unoccupied,which caters for most of the residents'needs. On the day of our visit{51%}of customers used the{food shops}and{36%} the{Post Office,Chemist}and{Newsagent. In the small{supermarket}we found an amazing number of imported food being sold.Out of the{460}different foods displayed{113}came from no fewer than{ {28}foreign countries as near as{France and as far as{Australia. However we also suspect that many foods manufactured in{Britain}also contain imported raw materials.
